title: So this just happened in the End Game Chat (Racism)
body: So, this jinx that I met wasn't very friendly. All game she basically spewed out racist remarks and did not stop abusing my team, so I just muted her but this is what she said in the end game chat. Not sure what riots gonna do, but here's the evidence just in case.

replies.body:
don't name and shame it's against forum rules.

send this in as a support ticket, you'll have a better chance of getting him banned that way.
Don't name and shame? I think I have a right to show everyone what this person has done, He's also done more than that in game and also after he added me.

Let me guess. You said something then he replies calling you bad then you keep dribbling then he keeps calling you bad then that repeats for the whole game then when you finally lose you decided it would be a great idea to try and get a reaction out of him so you can screenshot and post on the boards?

Also you muted this person so why would you stay in post game chat long enough to be abused and even accept their friend request?

Actually I never said anything to him all game, after we won he started bragging about how he carried and I basically said he didn't. It escalated from there and I wanted to see how far he went before he went pretty crazy near the end of the game with his racism. I only stayed to see where he would go with it and screenshot it to upload it here and on the ticket that I sent. I accepted his friend request to basically see what he would do like I did with the end game chat.
Hmmm stop dribbling we can tell from the screenshot that you were trying to get a reaction the whole time.

> [{quoted}](name=DinoMuncher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=jKGxHsQT,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-20T05:12:35.808+0000)
>
> Don't name and shame? I think I have a right to show everyone what this person has done, He's also done more than that in game and also after he added me.

look, I don't make the rules, I just tell people what they are.
his name is pretty funny though

You should have plenty of ideas on his personal life already just from looking at his in-game name.

Report, mute, ignore and move on bro don't waste your energy arguing with trash and scums.

[Send a Support Ticket (Link)](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us), if you are so concerned about him, send one and hopefully he will get banned faster.

It's the forum rule not to name and shame, it's better to just send a support ticket, report and ignore the guy, kinda pointless going all over the troll.

I sent a ticket after I made this post, I didn't know that it is forum rules to not name and shame so I apologise for that, I just wanted to show people that people like him exist, and need to be gotten rid of.
